usbd_dfu_descriptors.h

00002  @file   usbd_dfu_descriptors.h

00025 
00026 #if !defined (__USBD_DFU_DESCRIPTORS_H__)
00027 #define __USBD_DFU_DESCRIPTORS_H__
00028 
00029 /******************************************************************************
00030 **************************** Included header files ****************************
00031 *******************************************************************************/
00032 
00033 #include <usb_dfuspec.h>
00034 
00035 #define __USBD_ATTR__ __attribute__ ((__section__ (".usbdescriptors")))
00036 
00037 /******************************************************************************
00038 ********************************* DFU CONFIGS *********************************
00039 *******************************************************************************/
00040 typedef struct configuration_descriptor_dfu_t
00041 {
00042         USB_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR           sConfigDesc;
00043         USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR        sInterfaceDesc0;
00044         DFU_FUNCTIONAL_DESCRIPTOR       sDFUDesc;
00045 }__ATTR_PACKED__ CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_DFU;
00046 
00047 #define CONF_DESCRIPTOR_DFU_LENGTH      \
00048         (USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH + \
00049          USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH + \
00050          DFU_FUNCTIONAL_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH )
00051 
00052 /* Full speed version */
00053 static CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_DFU IMG_sDFUConfigurationDescriptor_FS __USBD_ATTR__ IMG_ALIGN(4) =
00054 {
00055         /* Configuration descriptor */
00056         {
00057                 USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,    // UCHAR   bLength;
00058                 USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,              // UCHAR   bDescriptorType;
00059                 USB_INI16(CONF_DESCRIPTOR_DFU_LENGTH),  // USHORT  wTotalLength;
00060                 0x01,                                                                   // UCHAR   bNumInterfaces;
00061                 0x01,                                                                   // UCHAR   bConfigurationValue;
00062                 0x00,                                                                   // UCHAR   iConfiguration;
00063                 0xC0,                                                                   // UCHAR   bmAttributes D7=reserved(set to 1);D6=self powered; D5=remote wakeup; D4-0 reserved (0);
00064                 0x00                                                                    // UCHAR   MaxPower;
00065         },
00066         /* Interface descriptor */
00067         {
00068                 USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,                // UCHAR   bLength;
00069                 USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,                  // UCHAR   bDescriptorType;
00070                 0x00,                                                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceNumber;
00071                 0x00,                                                                   // UCHAR   bAlternateSetting;
00072                 0x00,                                                                   // UCHAR   bNumEndpoints;
00073                 DFU_CLASS_CODE,                                                 // UCHAR   bInterfaceClass;
00074                 DFU_SUBCLASS_CODE,                                              // UCHAR   bInterfaceSubClass;
00075                 0x00,                                                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceProtocol;
00076                 0x00                                                                    // UCHAR   iInterface;
00077         },
00078         /* DFU functional descriptor */
00079         {
00080                 DFU_FUNCTIONAL_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,               // UCHAR   bLength;
00081                 DFU_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,                                    // UCHAR   bDescriptorType;
00082                 DFU_DOWNLOAD_CAPABLE | DFU_UPLOAD_CAPABLE | DFU_MANIFESTATION_TOLERANT, // UCHAR bmAttributes
00083                 USB_INI16(1000),                                                // USHORT  wDetatchTimeOut;
00084                 USB_INI16(264)                                                  // USHORT  wTransferSize;
00085         }
00086 };
00087 
00088 /* High speed version */
00089 static CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_DFU IMG_sDFUConfigurationDescriptor_HS __USBD_ATTR__ IMG_ALIGN(4) =
00090 {
00091         /* Configuration descriptor */
00092         {
00093                 USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,    // UCHAR   bLength;
00094                 USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,              // UCHAR   bDescriptorType;
00095                 USB_INI16(CONF_DESCRIPTOR_DFU_LENGTH),  // USHORT  wTotalLength;
00096                 0x01,                                                                   // UCHAR   bNumInterfaces;
00097                 0x01,                                                                   // UCHAR   bConfigurationValue;
00098                 0x00,                                                                   // UCHAR   iConfiguration;
00099                 0xC0,                                                                   // UCHAR   bmAttributes D7=reserved(set to 1);D6=self powered; D5=remote wakeup; D4-0 reserved (0);
00100                 0x00                                                                    // UCHAR   MaxPower;
00101         },
00102         /* Interface descriptor */
00103         {
00104                 USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,                // UCHAR   bLength;
00105                 USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,                  // UCHAR   bDescriptorType;
00106                 0x00,                                                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceNumber;
00107                 0x00,                                                                   // UCHAR   bAlternateSetting;
00108                 0x00,                                                                   // UCHAR   bNumEndpoints;
00109                 DFU_CLASS_CODE,                                                 // UCHAR   bInterfaceClass;
00110                 DFU_SUBCLASS_CODE,                                              // UCHAR   bInterfaceSubClass;
00111                 0x00,                                                                   // UCHAR   bInterfaceProtocol;
00112                 0x00                                                                    // UCHAR   iInterface
00113         },
00114         /* DFU functional descriptor */
00115         {
00116                 DFU_FUNCTIONAL_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH,               // UCHAR   bLength;
00117                 DFU_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE,                                    // UCHAR   bDescriptorType;
00118                 DFU_DOWNLOAD_CAPABLE | DFU_UPLOAD_CAPABLE | DFU_MANIFESTATION_TOLERANT, // UCHAR bmAttributes
00119                 USB_INI16(1000),                                                // USHORT  wDetatchTimeOut;
00120                 USB_INI16(264)                                                  // USHORT  wTransferSize;
00121         }
00122 };
00123 
00124 USBD_CONFIGURATION_T    IMG_sDFUConfigurations =
00125 {
00126         {
00127                 &IMG_sDFUConfigurationDescriptor_FS,
00128                 0
00129         },                                                                                      /* apsConfigDescriptorFullSpeed */
00130         {
00131                 &IMG_sDFUConfigurationDescriptor_HS,
00132                 0                                                                               
00133         },                                                                                      /* apsConfigDescriptorHighSpeed */
00134         1                                                                                       /* ui8NumConfigurations */
00135 };
00136 
00137 #endif /* __USBD_DFU_DESCRIPTORS_H */
